faq_data.question: Are lightsabers allowed inside the convention?
faq_data.answer: We'd love to see your lightsaber skills, but for safety reasons (and to prevent any accidental dismemberments), lightsabers are a no-go. You can still channel your inner Jedi through cosplay, though!

faq_data.question: What's the deal with cosplay weapons?
faq_data.answer: Good question! We're totally cool with cosplay weapons, as long as they're peace-bonded by our friendly Wookiee security team. Just remember, no Death Star lasers, please.

faq_data.question: Do I have to speak Klingon to attend the Sci-Fi panel?
faq_data.answer: Nah, you're good! While speaking Klingon would earn you some nerd street cred, it's not a requirement. Our panelists are fluent in English, Wookiee, and a few other intergalactic languages.

faq_data.question: Will there be snacks?
faq_data.answer: Absolutely! We've got snacks fit for hobbits, replicators stocked with sci-fi treats, and butterbeer that would make even the Hogwarts gang jealous. Leave your ration packs at home!

faq_data.question: Can I bring my pet Tribble to the convention?
faq_data.answer: As cute as Tribbles are, they have a tendency to multiply faster than you can say 'Beam me up.' To avoid a furry catastrophe, please leave your Tribbles at home.

faq_data.question: What happens if I accidentally time-travel during the Doctor Who panel?
faq_data.answer: Don't panic! Our Gallifreyan panelists are experts in timey-wimey stuff. They'll have you back in your proper era in no time. Just be sure not to step on any butterflies.

faq_data.question: Do you have a lost and found for misplaced teleporters?
faq_data.answer: We sure do! If your teleporter ends up in the wrong galaxy or just vanishes into a parallel universe, swing by our Lost & Found. Our crew of dimension-hoppers will help you out.

faq_data.question: Can I use the Bat-Signal to find my friends?
faq_data.answer: While it's tempting to summon your pals with the Bat-Signal, we recommend sticking to good old-fashioned text messages. It's quicker and doesn't attract Gotham's rogues' gallery.

faq_data.question: Is there a costume contest?
faq_data.answer: You bet your utility belt there is! Get ready to strut your stuff on our cosplay stage. Prizes include the admiration of fellow nerds and some sweet loot from across the multiverse.

faq_data.question: What's the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?
faq_data.answer: Ah, a true geek classic! The airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow is approximately 24 miles per hour. Just remember, that's in Earth's atmosphere, not Middle-earth.

art_vendors.description: Explore a world of comic art, from superhero sketches to graphic novel illustrations.
Dive into the realms of fantasy with stunning canvas paintings inspired by comics and sci-fi.
Marvel at superhero sculptures meticulously crafted to capture every detail.
Get your hands on exclusive comic book merchandise, from collectibles to apparel.
Witness the art of inking with live demonstrations and unique ink creations.

merch_vendors.description: Your one-stop shop for all things geeky and collectible, from action figures to posters.
Express your love for comics with a wide range of themed t-shirts and apparel.
Top off your superhero look with iconic hats and headwear from your favorite comics.
Discover rare and vintage comic book collectibles that every fan will cherish.
Decorate your space with stunning comic book posters featuring your beloved heroes.

events.description: Kick off the convention with an exciting opening ceremony. Join us for special guest introductions, cosplay showcases, and surprises!
Join us for an exciting panel discussion on the history and future of comic books.
Meet your favorite comic book artists and get your comics signed.
Show off your amazing cosplay skills and win fantastic prizes!
Enjoy a special screening of the latest superhero blockbuster movie.
Bid on rare and collectible comic books from various eras.
Learn the art of character design from industry experts.
Get up close and personal with your favorite superheroes. Take photos, get autographs, and chat with the stars!
Join bestselling science fiction authors as they discuss their latest works, share insights, and answer your burning questions.
Compete in a thrilling video game tournament. Prizes await the champions, so bring your A-game!
Wrap up the convention with our grand closing ceremony. Reflect on the amazing weekend and get a sneak peek at whatâ€™s to come next year!

hotels.hotelName: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Springfield-Medical District
hotels.hotelDescription: Located in the heart of Springfield, this Holiday Inn Express is within a few blocks from the steps of the convention and within walking distance of the critically acclaimed Krusty Burger.

hotels.hotelAddress: 7010 Old Keene Mill Rd, Springfield, VA 22150
hotels.hotelDescription: Homewood Suites is a block off the main drag and perfect for anybody looking for a bit more quiet and seclusion. Free property wide wi-fi and a rooftop pool are key features to keep in mind.

If distance is your concern the Wyndham in City Center is right across the street from the convention! Easy accessibility, but with the great location comes heavy foot traffic. This hotel is perfect for accessibility and mobility options, but fills up quick -- so book quickly if this fits your bill!

hotels.hotelName: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham
hotels.hotelDescription: If you're okay with a little bit more of a venture and perhaps the best features to value ratio, La Quinta should be your top contender ikn Springfield. Great price, scenic walk, and lots of off-the-beaten-path shops nearby.

If you're on a budget the Country Inn is your best value in the market. If your primary focus is a bed to sleep in and a warm shower then this no frills location is just right to keep you fresh and engaged at the convention.
